name: Global Defender (itch) (Gold_Blob)
description:
Hello!This is my game for the bullet hell game jam!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Here are the intructions!

The enemy has 100hp and every second it deplenishs 1hp

wasd: move

Every 10 secs the enemy will teleport to a random location and shoot a green projectile that bouces of wall

Debug keys:K for 50hp and m for 10hp

Have fun!
